content:
Sure, here are the headquarters of the companies mentioned so far:

1. AGC Automotive: Tokyo, Japan
2. Saint-Gobain Sekurit: Courbevoie, France
3. Fuyao Glass: Fuqing, China
4. Nippon Sheet Glass (NSG): Tokyo, Japan
5. Vitro Automotive: San Pedro Garza Garcia, Mexico
6. Pilkington: St Helens, United Kingdom
7. Guardian Industries: Auburn Hills, Michigan, United States
8. Corning: Corning, New York, United States
9. Xinyi Glass: Hong Kong, China
10. Asahi Glass Co. (AGC): Tokyo, Japan
11. PPG Industries: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States
12. Central Glass: Ube, Japan

Please note that some of these companies may have multiple locations and headquarters in different regions, but the locations listed here are the primary headquarters.
